text:
Hi HubSpot People,
Can i send sales email to prospects via HubSpot api, if yes can you please guide
Hi, Can we log users out from HubSpot crm portal using an api or something?
Thank you Chris. This was exactly what I was looking for!

Hi HubSpot Community. We've recently started using HubSpot and are looking to integrate our whole back end and business work flows into HubSpot across sales, operations and customer support. We're looking to hire a full time Business Analyst who can help us to build out a full integration into HubSpot as well as supporting our product teams to inform the right feature builds. Ideally we're looking for someone UK based but open to remote. Let me know if this is the wrong place to add this type of message!
<@U05DY0YE2GJ> you might want to check out an agency that specializes in implementation and growth, I highly recommend Jonathan Price with Growth London <https://www.growthlondon.uk/>

<@U05DY0YE2GJ> HubSpot does a great job of highlighting their preferred partners for work similar to this. You can find a list of some of these agencies here > <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/177047/marketplace/solutions>
Yes this is possible!
I somehow got around HubSpot’s brand domain limit, by testing something! Key note, this is only for brand new portals. Not existing portal.
Oh really? I didn’t think so because the slide-in is iframed. Could you share your solution please? :)
Since its so custom it would require scoping for me to be able to provide an actual solution for you, but just wanted to confirm that it is indeed possible!

Hello HubSpot People,
We are an agency in London looking for a hands-on HS developer, ASAP.
Starting next week to troubleshoot some modules, responsive hiccups and help refine a site. We are 8 work days from launch, and have had a team-member family situation, so need a trustworthy, skilled player who wants to be a part of a small, dynamic team, to help make something nice.
Please do not hesitate to get in touch.
Damian
<http://semi-famous.com|semi-famous.com>
Check DM
I don’t need a tailored solution, just the overall process of how you did it is fine.

:sparkles:Slack Tips and Best Practices:sparkles:

To get the most out the HubSpot Developer Slack, follow these best practices:

• Will your post/question potentially help more than one person? Ask in a public channel instead of 1:1 DMs to help as many folks as possible. 
• Thread all replies to keep topics organized and searchable
• Thread followup questions/comments to your original post
• Don't post the same question in multiple channels. If you must, link to your original question in new channels.
More <https://slack.com/blog/collaboration/etiquette-tips-in-slack|great tips here>. Thanks for making the HubSpot Developer Slack easier to use for everyone!
I need some help on what the best type of reports you should have for marketing demand Gen and if they are mostly custom or already provided by HubSpot
Hi everyone. Anyone happen to know how I find the list of Dynamic Tokens and what values they are tied to in HubSpot?
For example, I don't know what to choose here. I want the email to come from the Deal Owner (sales person over that account).
I'd suggest posting this in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs>, <@U05DWP297PX>
Hey there <@U05DY0YE2GJ>! Please consider posting this in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> - thanks!
Good idea! Thanks
